name: do gay crime
description:
be gay & do crime

Beta version!! Full release coming soon!

You play as 'Blue' who is a gender ambiguous blueberry looking to cause mischief around town! Look out for friends who encourage you to commit crimes for them & explore the area to collect items.

Features: Coming Soon:



*Not playable on mobile devices, sorry!

This is a submission for the Non-Binary Game Jam 2022,

Trans Representation Jam 22, Trans Joy Jam & Trans Gal Jam 2022!

SFX: [ Adventure Music & SFX ]
